sentences.sentence: In the Svoboda Donetsk direction, he says, the enemy continues to fire from cannon artillery and multiple rocket launchers at the positions of our troops and civilian infrastructure near Lysyshansk, Meteol Kine, Ostenivka and Voronova.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Tensions are building in Lysysansk. Less than half the pre-war population remain there with no electricity and very few means of communicating with the outside world.

sentences.sentence: In Ohrid, North Macedonia, the Prespa Forum is taking place with heads of state, governments and diplomats from the Western Balkans and the European Union.

sentences.sentence: And it's France that's been particularly badly hit.

sentences.sentence: For some in Paris, especially those in top four apartments with metallic roofs, it's all too much to bear. 70 year old Christian can't get to sleep. He's part of a growing but largely unnoticed group of people in summer energy poverty, those who can't afford to cool themselves. Even with the help of a local nonprofit organization there's not much he can do.

sentences.sentence: And on Sunday the heatwave is due to spread to more central and eastern areas of Europe too, such as Germany and Poland.

On the ground, the Israeli military has been carrying out nearly daily raids in the occupied West Bank since a string of attacks earlier this year killed 19 people in Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.sentence: Romance and passion are at the heart of the Cabourg Film Festival in Normandy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A major event for French and international cinema, the festival welcomes more than 12,000 people over five days for screenings both in theaters and outdoors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The central theme is romanticism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And for the 36th edition this year, the festival is paying tribute to one of Europe's most popular talents, German-French actress Romy Schneider.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: One of London's hottest exhibitions this summer is getting even hotter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The summer exhibition at the Royal Academy of Art is focused on climate this year, with artwork addressing global warming and climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The event showcases art in all its forms, from prints, paintings, film, photography, to architectural works and sculpture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The pieces on display this year shine a light on the state of the present and future of our planet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And in Madrid, a new exhibition within Photo España immerses visitors into the fantasy world of artist Carlotta Gómez, too. The show is called Realities and Delusions, and it takes a radical look at the state of the planet through the misuse of everyday objects and habits.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
